DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current study test efficacy two brief , behavioral intervention intend improve burnout among doctoral-level graduate student ( n = 102 ) . Specifically , individual randomly assign one three intervention condition : 1 ) Reward : brief intervention help participant increase engagement healthy reward values-driven behavior , 2 ) Approach : brief intervention help participant identify decrease emotion-driven avoidance important goal , 3 ) Control : control condition involve monitor . Multilevel model use ass change burnout , mood , stress , follow intervention , control participant ' individual baseline level variable .
DOC.criteria: Currently enrol inperson ( online ) Ph.D. program state North Carolina Demonstrating average level burnout Has regular access Internet Has Social Security Number Is able read understand English Current mania psychosis Current suicidal ideation Are currently psychotherapy , psychotherapy past 8 week , plan start psychotherapy course 10day study Have change psychiatric medication past 8 week , take medication prescribe plan change medication course 10day study Are currently take benzodiazepine Pro Re Nata ( PRN ) Are 18 year old
